title: SEO Optimisation
text: In this SEO mission for the La Panthère website, I identified non-optimized sections, developed correction strategies after detailed analysis, made adjustments, and conducted thorough tests with Lighthouse. My work brought significant improvements, enhancing the user experience and the site's SEO.

title: API Build
text: I created a secure API for a spicy sauce review site. The API's goal is to allow users to create an account on the site and add, modify, and delete their own sauces, as well as view and like/dislike sauces from other users.

title: ReactJs web Application
text: Implementation of a reactive web application using ReactJS, based on the design provided in a Figma mockup. State management with React ensures a smooth user experience. Responsive Design guarantees adaptability to all devices.

title: E-commerce website
text: With the frontend and backend already built, I programmed the logic to dynamically display products from the backend. I created a script allowing users to manipulate items: add/remove products to the cart, choose quantity, and select the color of the product, etc.
